titles: To the Honourable House of Commons in this present Parliament assembled The humble petition of the Company of Stationers of the City of London.
author: Stationers' Company (London, England)
notes: Praying that the "new impression of the Bible may be printed for the common benefit of the whole Company" and not for the benefit of eleven of their number, "who now labour to gaine to themselves the sole printing of this Bible."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Stationers' Company (London, England) --  Early works to 1800.
